name: Discovering Montevideo's Ciudad Vieja
description: Explore the historic Ciudad Vieja (Old Town) of Montevideo, filled with colonial architecture, museums, and vibrant street art.

name: Punta del Este Beaches
description: Relax on the beautiful beaches of Punta del Este, known for their golden sands, clear waters, and lively beach culture.

name: Colonia del Sacramento's Historic District
description: Step back in time in Colonia del Sacramento's historic district, a UNESCO World Heritage site, with cobblestone streets and colonial architecture.

name: Trekking in Cabo Polonio
description: Go trekking in Cabo Polonio, a remote and off-the-grid coastal village surrounded by sand dunes and a rugged natural landscape.

name: Wine Tasting in Carmelo
description: Indulge in wine tasting in Carmelo, Uruguay's wine region, and visit wineries to sample some of the country's finest wines.

name: Uruguay's Estancias
description: Stay at an estancia (rural estate) in the countryside to experience Uruguayan gaucho culture, horseback riding, and traditional hospitality.

name: Cerro Largo Nature Reserves
description: Explore the nature reserves in the Cerro Largo department, offering hiking, birdwatching, and opportunities to connect with nature.

name: Paddleboarding in Laguna Garzón
description: Enjoy paddleboarding in Laguna Garzón, a scenic coastal lagoon known for its tranquil waters and beautiful surroundings.

name: Chasing Waterfalls in Quebrada de los Cuervos
description: Hike and chase waterfalls in Quebrada de los Cuervos, a picturesque natural reserve with canyons, cliffs, and lush greenery.

name: Visit Punta Ballena and Casapueblo
description: Visit Punta Ballena and the iconic Casapueblo, a unique building and art gallery created by artist Carlos Páez Vilaró.
